text: Welcome to the IP mission, Securing Innovation, Sustaining Readiness.
Intellectual property is the backbone of the Department of War Acquisitions and is critical for cost control and technological advantage.
Our workforce needs clear guidance, prefers virtual learning, and faces recurring IP challenges across the acquisition lifecycle.
SBR and STTR programs fuel innovation with non-dilutive funding and let small businesses keep their intellectual property.
To close the gaps, we recommend a centralized IP hub, quick reference guides, scenario-based workshops, and AI-focused training modules.
Better IP resources mean reduced risk and stronger innovation.
